data_description.dimmer: The dimmer that will be controlled.
data_description.input_select: The dropdown helper that defines the options.
data_description.triggers: The entities that will activate the dimmer.
data_description.script: The script that runs when the dimmer is triggered.

hours.description: The number of hours to disable the Motion Dimmer.
hours.name: hours

minutes.description: The number of minutes to disable the Motion Dimmer.
minutes.name: minutes

seconds.name: seconds

enable.name: enable

finish_timer.name: finish_timer
finish_timer.description: Stops a running timer and turns off the dimmer if triggers are not still active.
